title: Largest Reduction of Municipal Solid Wastes

content.description: The two pie charts show municipal solid waste (<math alttext="M S W" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>MSW</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) in the United States, 2015.
content.question: Based on the data in the graphs, which of the following would result in the largest reduction in volume of municipal solid waste disposed of in landfills?

choices.label: Introduce composting programs for yard trimmings and food waste
Increase programs to recycle glass and metals
Promote reusing plastics and wood products
Increase funding to clothing donation programs

content.answer: Introduce composting programs for yard trimmings and food waste

skill.text: Skill 7.D: Use data and evidence to support a potential solution.
